"A.P.241/9/23/13:00":
"A report from Earth Guide says
that they haven't detected
<%me> on Earth."

"Incoming emergency transmission
from an operator? Is this a telescopic image?"
"The universe, it's distorting..."

"Isn't this a black hole?
They're not exactly rare,
however..."

"Wait, did they just say it just,
suddenly appeared? They shouldn't
be able to do that at all!"

"It's an intermediate mass-type, but it
keeps denying observations?"
"And something is odd about its rate of expansion. If it continues to expand at this pace, the entire universe will be sucked in."

"This type of black hole, shouldn't
exist logically.
What is going on here...?"

"I wonder if this is due to
<%me>'s disappearance?"

"Considering the timing, I don't
think this is a mere coincidence.
I'll try combining them to figure
it out."
"Sorry to keep you waiting."

"I guess we share common knowledge
regarding that black hole.
Saves me the trouble of an explanation."
"There's some good news and some bad news."

"The good news is, we received
a reading on
<%me>."

"Really!? Then we should hurry and rescue
<%me>!"
"Calm down Matoi. Now for the bad news."

"The reading is coming from the center
of that black hole."

"The one and only absolute system.
Where the universe first began.
Planet Xion's former location."

"And from within there, is where
<%me> is located."
